q: African military chiefs said they were on standby if called-- although neighbouring countries appear a long way from agreement on using force to oust Gbagbo after a November 28 election which U.N.-certified results show he lost. Everyone realises that the only solution is to make Mr Laurent Gbagbo leave with other measures, including force, Alassane Ouattara said, a day after the latest African mediation efforts led by Kenyan premier Raila Odinga collapsed.
